name: SPACE EXPLORATION TECHNOLOGIES CORP.
sampleDescriptions: Monitor draft infrastructure proposals.

Support for efforts to encourage competition in the Evolved Expendable Launch Vehicle; monitor S. 1519 / H.R. 2810, the National Defense Authorization Act for Fiscal Year 2018 (P.L. 115-91); H.R. 3219, the Make America Secure Appropriations Act of 2018; and H.R. 3354, the Make America Secure and Prosperous Appropriations Act of 2018.

Support for NASA's commercial crew program; monitor H.R. 3267 / S. 1662, the Commerce, Justice, Science, and Related Agencies Appropriations Act of 2018, H.R. 3354, the Make America Secure and Prosperous Appropriations Act of 2018, and draft NASA reauthorization bill.

Support for NASA's commercial crew program; monitor H.R. 3267 / S. 1662, the Commerce, Justice, Science, and Related Agencies Appropriations Act of 2018; H.R. 3354, the Make America Secure and Prosperous Appropriations Act of 2018; and H.R. 5503 / S. 3799, the NASA reauthorization bill.
